On my home screen, I have apps for essential daily use, including the App Store, browser, news, to-do list, proxy app, AI chatbots, crypto trading, as well as banking and asset management apps. These are the tools I rely on for staying updated and organized.

I can be selective about this, and few people will be offended. Most of these are famous or popular products, so they probably won’t care whether I like them or not - I’m just one user among many. I also contribute to these platforms.
